BriefDescription: The rate of L1 TLB misses caused by data loads per kilo instructions retired
The ratio of L1 TLB load misses to the total number of L1 TLB load accesses
The rate of L1 TLB misses caused by data stores per kilo instructions retired
The ratio of L1 TLB store misses to the total number of L1 TLB store accesses
The rate of ITLB misses caused by instruction fetches per kilo instructions retired
The ratio of ITLB instruction fetch misses to the total number of L1 TLB instruction fetch accesses
The rate of last level TLB misses caused by data loads per kilo instructions retired
The ratio of last level TLB load misses to the total number of last level TLB load accesses
The rate of last level TLB misses caused by data stores per kilo instructions retired
The ratio of last level TLB store misses to the total number of last level TLB store accesses
The rate of last level TLB misses caused by instruction fetches per kilo instructions retired
The ratio of last level TLB instruction fetch misses to the total number of last level TLB instruction fetch accesses
